p: The implementation of routine prophylaxis program and lack of new cases due to paucity of delivery at home in Turkey are major causes for failure to include preplanned study population of 75 patients. Thus, majority of patients were old cases in this study. Some patients couldn't be included due to replacement of hospital database and incomplete data gathered from parents. We think that limited number of patients precluded showing poorer prognosis in VKOCRC allele carriers than those without VKORC allele.
